description: Lightweight, all-day-comfort hiking pants with stretch, zip-off legs and 40+ UPF sun protection; made with a 95% nylon (65% recycled)/5% spandex fabric blend. Inseam of pants is 32 in.
name: Patagonia Quandary Convertible Pants, Reg - Mens

specs.value: 4.2-oz 95% nylon (65% recycled), 5% spandex with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish and 40+ UPF sun protection
